longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry issued to
  nationals of Denmark must be valid on arrival. 
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of emergency or temporary passports.

VISA NOT REQUIRED.

Minors:
- All minors who are nationals of Denmark are expected to hold
  their own travel document. 
- WARNING! In accordance with European Union (EU) Legislation,
  all minors who are nationals of Denmark will be expected to
  hold their own passport or National ID Card (where
  applicable) when departing from Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus,
  Romania or a Schengen Member State . 
- A visa issued to the parent is also valid for the minor
  provided minor's name is also mentioned in the visa.
Additional Information:
- Extension of stay possible for 
Warning:
- These entry regulations apply only to the part of Cyprus
  controlled by the government of Cyprus (i.e. they are not
  applicable at Ercan (ECN) and at Gercitkale (GEC)).
 - For entry regulations applicable at Ercan (ECN), see:
   http://mfa.gov.ct
